name: CassaDecor
tag_list: home-decor, luxury, high-end, bath, bedding, organic, bamboo, egyptian-cotton, turkish-long-staple-cotton, supima, linens, towels, bath-robes, bath-rugs, accessories, shower-curtains, designer-brands, kids, babies
overview:
CassaDecor is more than just another place to shop—it is a testament to your good taste.

Three in-house, enthusiastic founders boasting thirty years of combined experience plus devoted support staff in New York City and Miami means an amazing team behind every, single purchase you make. Each of our products is selected because it displays a higher sense of design, luxury, value, style, sophistication and enduring quality. These are truly hallmarks of every CassaDecor product.

From our 100% Egyptian cotton and Turkish towels to our eco-friendly organic cotton and bamboo collections, we offer some of the best bed and bath linens available. It could be a sheet set for the bedroom, bathrobes for your bathroom, or even a towel for the beach—we want to inspire every choice you make. We want you to take joy in making your home feel and look as comfortable as possible, and not spend a fortune doing so.

At CassaDecor we want to revolutionize the way people shop for the home. Our strong, experienced team strives to bring you a shopping experience that is at once innovative yet comfortable, social yet personal. We will achieve this through an unwavering commitment to our three company pillars: our attentive, in-house customer service; consistently rich, insightful site content; and of course our unbeatable quality products. Through these company elements, Cassadecor is bringing a superior boutique experience right to your home, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

Any questions about who we are and what we offer? Feel free to send us a note at customerservice@cassadecor.com
